messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] NHK based fanart and chibi
messages.msgSnippet: OMG! They re adorable Sec! And I just love how Hijikata is fuming and Saito is carving away! LOL! You hunted that pic down just for him carving a
messages.messageBody:
OMG! They're adorable Sec! And I just love how Hijikata is fuming and Saito
is carving away! LOL! You hunted that pic down just for him carving a
mini-fundoshi, didn't you?!

-MissB


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
